title: John J. Conger, Ph.D. Lectureship In Child Mental Health Policy Endowment Fund
description: To support a lectureship focused on child mental health policy in the School of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  The intent is for the Conger Lectureship to be an annual event.
marketingContent: To support a lectureship focused on child mental health policy in the School of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. The intent is for the Conger Lectureship to be an annual event.
